# Workflow Allowlist

Allowed active workflows:
- ci-2025.yml
- pr-validation.yml
- _go-ci-job.yml
- ubuntu-ci.yml
- emergency-merge.yml
- go-module-cache.yml
- ci-monitoring.yml
- cache-recovery-system.yml
- branch-protection-setup.yml
- debug-ghcr-auth.yml
- claude.yml
- emergency-disable.yml

Required protected-branch check contexts:
- Basic Validation
